title: The barrons vvars in the raigne of Edward the second. VVith Englands heroicall epistles. By Michael Drayton
author: Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.
publisher: Printed by I[ames] R[oberts] for N. Ling,
notes: Part 1 is an extensively revised version of "Mortimeriados". Part 2 is a reissue, with quire A cancelled, of the 1602 edition of "Englands heroicall epistles". It includes the sonnet sequence "Idea".
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.
